title: Circolo Pantagruel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine
description: Members-only restaurant, bar, and cultural center; the membership card can be obtained at entrance free of charge. Located inside the courtyard. Food is freshly prepared daily with locally sourced and organic ingredients. Vegans to specify as some dishes contain dairy and/or egg. Some nights feature themes like "vegan burger night" or "vintage tea party night" and other events.
